**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\Render\Js\audio.js**

```javascript
host  = window.location.host;
host2 = document.location.protocol;
url   = host2 + '//' + host;
function secondsToTime(secs)
{
    secs = Math.round(secs);
    var hours = Math.floor(secs / (60 * 60));

    var divisor_for_minutes = secs % (60 * 60);
    var minutes = Math.floor(divisor_for_minutes / 60);

    var divisor_for_seconds = divisor_for_minutes % 60;
    var seconds = Math.ceil(divisor_for_seconds);

    var obj =hours+':'+minutes+':'+seconds;
    if(hours==0){
        var obj =minutes+':'+seconds;
    }
    return obj;
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    // 设置音频文件名显示宽度
    var element = document.querySelectorAll('.audio-right');
    // 初始化音频控制事件
    if(element.length > 0){
        initAudioEvent();
        initAudioEventList();
    }
}, false);

function initAudioEvent() {
    var audio = document.getElementsByTagName('audio')[0];
    var audioPlayer = document.getElementById('audioPlayer');

    // 监听音频播放时间并更新进度条
    audio.addEventListener('timeupdate', function () {
        updateProgress(audio);
    }, false);
    // 音乐总时长 开始
    var audioElement = new Audio(audio.src);
    var secondToMin = function(seconds) {
        var m = parseInt(seconds / 60)
        var s = parseInt(seconds % 60)
        return m + ':' + s
    }
    var duration
    audioElement.addEventListener("loadedmetadata", function (_event) {
        duration = audioElement.duration;
        var songTime = secondToMin(duration)
        var songTimeHtml = `<span class="songTime">${songTime}</span>`
        $('#audioAllTime').append(songTimeHtml);
    }, false);
    // 结束

    // 监听播放完成事件
    audio.addEventListener('ended', function () {
        audioEnded();
    }, false);

    // 点击播放/暂停图片时，控制音乐的播放与暂停
    audioPlayer.addEventListener('click', function () {
        // 改变播放/暂停图片
        if (audio.paused) {
            // 开始播放当前点击的音频
            audio.play();
            audioPlayer.src = url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/pause.svg';
        } else {
            audio.pause();
            audioPlayer.src = url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/play.svg';
        }
    }, false);

    var progressBarBg = document.getElementById('progressBarBg');
    if(progressBarBg){
        progressBarBg.addEventListener('mousedown', function (event) {
            // 只有音乐开始播放后才可以调节，已经播放过但暂停了的也可以
            if (!audio.paused || audio.currentTime != 0) {
                var pgsWidth = parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(progressBarBg, null).width.replace('px', ''));
                var rate = event.offsetX / pgsWidth;
                audio.currentTime = audio.duration * rate;
                updateProgress(audio);
            }
        }, false);
    }

    // 拖动进度点调节进度
    dragProgressDotEvent(audio);
}

function initAudioEventList() {

    // 点击播放/暂停图片时，控制音乐的播放与暂停
    $('.audioPlayerList').on('click', function () {
        // 改变播放/暂停图片
        let audio= document.getElementById($(this).parent().parent().parent().find('audio').attr("id"))
        if (audio.paused) {
            $(this).attr('src' , url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/pause.svg');
            // 开始播放当前点击的音频
            audio.play();
        } else {
            $(this).attr('src' , url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/play.svg');
            audio.pause();
        }
    });

    // 监听音频播放时间并更新进度条
    $('.audio-play-list').on('timeupdate', function () {
        let music_id=$(this).attr("id")
        updateProgress2(music_id)
    });
    $('.audio-play-list').on('ended', function () {
        let music_id=$(this).attr("id")
        audioEnded2(music_id)
    });

    // 拖动进度点调节进度 music_id 区分
    // 拖动进度点调节进度
    for(i=0;i<$('.audio-play-list').length;i++){
        var music_id=$('.audio-play-list')[i].id

        var progressBarBg = document.getElementById('progressBarBg-'+music_id);
        progressBarBg.addEventListener('mousedown', function (event) {

            let music_id=event.currentTarget.dataset.id
            let audio=document.getElementById(music_id);

            // 只有音乐开始播放后才可以调节，已经播放过但暂停了的也可以
            if (!audio.paused || audio.currentTime != 0) {
                var pgsWidth = parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(progressBarBg, null).width.replace('px', ''));
                var rate = event.offsetX / pgsWidth;
                audio.currentTime = audio.duration * rate;
                updateProgress2(music_id);
            }
        }, false);

        // dragProgressDotEvent2(audio,music_id);
    }




}

/**
 * 鼠标拖动进度点时可以调节进度
 * @param {*} audio
 */
function dragProgressDotEvent(audio) {
    var dot = document.getElementById('progressDot');

    var position = {
        oriOffestLeft: 0, // 移动开始时进度条的点距离进度条的偏移值
        oriX: 0, // 移动开始时的x坐标
        maxLeft: 0, // 向左最大可拖动距离
        maxRight: 0 // 向右最大可拖动距离
    };
    var flag = false; // 标记是否拖动开始

    // 鼠标按下时
    dot.addEventListener('mousedown', down, false);
    dot.addEventListener('touchstart', down, false);

    // 开始拖动
    document.addEventListener('mousemove', move, false);
    document.addEventListener('touchmove', move, false);

    // 拖动结束
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', end, false);
    document.addEventListener('touchend', end, false);

    function down(event) {
        if (!audio.paused || audio.currentTime != 0) { // 只有音乐开始播放后才可以调节，已经播放过但暂停了的也可以
            flag = true;

            position.oriOffestLeft = dot.offsetLeft;
            position.oriX = event.touches ? event.touches[0].clientX : event.clientX; // 要同时适配mousedown和touchstart事件
            position.maxLeft = position.oriOffestLeft; // 向左最大可拖动距离
            position.maxRight = document.getElementById('progressBarBg').offsetWidth - position.oriOffestLeft; // 向右最大可拖动距离

            // 禁止默认事件（避免鼠标拖拽进度点的时候选中文字）
            if (event && event.preventDefault) {
                event.preventDefault();
            } else {
                event.returnValue = false;
            }

            // 禁止事件冒泡
            if (event && event.stopPropagation) {
                event.stopPropagation();
            } else {
                window.event.cancelBubble = true;
            }
        }
    }

    function move(event) {
        if (flag) {
            var clientX = event.touches ? event.touches[0].clientX : event.clientX; // 要同时适配mousemove和touchmove事件
            var length = clientX - position.oriX;
            if (length > position.maxRight) {
                length = position.maxRight;
            } else if (length < -position.maxLeft) {
                length = -position.maxLeft;
            }
            var progressBarBg = document.getElementById('progressBarBg');
            var pgsWidth = parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(progressBarBg, null).width.replace('px', ''));
            var rate = (position.oriOffestLeft + length) / pgsWidth;
            audio.currentTime = audio.duration * rate;
            updateProgress(audio);
        }
    }

    function end() {
        flag = false;
    }
}

/**
 * 更新进度条与当前播放时间
 * @param {object} audio - audio对象
 */
function updateProgress(audio) {
    var value = audio.currentTime / audio.duration;
    document.getElementById('progressBar').style.width = value * 100 + '%';
    document.getElementById('progressDot').style.left = value * 100 + '%';
    document.getElementById('audioCurTime').innerText = transTime(audio.currentTime);
}

function updateProgress2(music_id) {
    var audio=document.getElementById(music_id);
    var value = audio.currentTime / audio.duration;
    document.getElementById('progressBar-'+music_id).style.width = value * 100 + '%';
    document.getElementById('progressDot-'+music_id).style.left = value * 100 + '%';
    document.getElementById('audioCurTime-'+music_id).innerText = transTime(audio.currentTime);
}

/**
 * 播放完成时把进度调回开始的位置
 */
function audioEnded() {
    document.getElementById('progressBar').style.width = 0;
    document.getElementById('progressDot').style.left = 0;
    document.getElementById('audioCurTime').innerText = transTime(0);
    document.getElementById('audioPlayer').src = url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/play.svg';
}
function audioEnded2(music_id) {
    document.getElementById('progressBar-'+music_id).style.width = 0;
    document.getElementById('progressDot-'+music_id).style.left = 0;
    document.getElementById('audioCurTime-'+music_id).innerText = transTime(0);
    document.getElementById('audioPlayer-'+music_id).src = url + '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/play.svg';
}

/**
 * 音频播放时间换算
 * @param {number} value - 音频当前播放时间，单位秒
 */
function transTime(value) {
    var time = "";
    var h = parseInt(value / 3600);
    value %= 3600;
    var m = parseInt(value / 60);
    var s = parseInt(value % 60);
    if (h > 0) {
        time = formatTime(h + ":" + m + ":" + s);
    } else {
        time = formatTime(m + ":" + s);
    }

    return time;
}

/**
 * 格式化时间显示，补零对齐
 * eg：2:4  -->  02:04
 * @param {string} value - 形如 h:m:s 的字符串
 */
function formatTime(value) {
    var time = "";
    var s = value.split(':');
    var i = 0;
    for (; i < s.length - 1; i++) {
        time += s[i].length == 1 ? ("0" + s[i]) : s[i];
        time += ":";
    }
    time += s[i].length == 1 ? ("0" + s[i]) : s[i];

    return time;
}
```

**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\Render\Js\jitheme.js**

```javascript
/**
 *极主题JS文件
*/
//滚动
$(function () {
    setInterval(function () {
        $('.news-list').animate({
            marginTop: '0px'
        }, 2000, function () {
        $(this).css({ marginTop: "0px" });
            var li = $(".news-list").children().first().clone()
            $(".news-list li:last").after(li);
            $(".news-list li:first").remove();
        })
    }, 3000)
})
//导航
$(document).scroll(function(e) {
    $(window).scrollTop() > 150 ? $('#page').addClass('ji_haeder') : $('#page').removeClass('ji_haeder');
});
//统计
$('.toggle-input').on('change', function() {
    $('body').toggleClass('light-version');
});
//单行滚动弹幕
function noticeUp(obj,top,time) {
    $(obj).animate({
    marginTop: top
    }, time, function () {
    $(this).css({marginTop:"0"}).find(":first").appendTo(this);
    })
}
/*幻灯片菜单首页动态大图搜索开始*/
const liElements = document.querySelectorAll('.main-menus .li');
liElements.forEach(li => {
  li.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
    li.classList.add('show');
    const subElement = li.querySelector('.sub');
    subElement.style.display = 'block';
    subElement.classList.add('fade-in');
  });
  li.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
    li.classList.remove('show');
    const subElement = li.querySelector('.sub');
    subElement.classList.remove('fade-in');
    setTimeout(() => {
      subElement.style.display = 'none';
    }, 300);
  });
});
/*首页动态大图搜索开始*/
(function($){
  var m=$('.primary-menus');
  if(m.length<1) return;
  var ul=m.find('.selects');
  if(ul.length<1) return;
  var lis=ul.children('li');
  if(lis.length<1) return;
  var s=m.find('.search');
  var sVal=s.find('.s').val();
  lis.on('click',function () {
    var d=$(this).attr('data-target');
    if (d) {
      lis.removeClass('current');
      $(this).addClass('current');
      s.addClass('hidden');
      s.filter('#'+d).removeClass('hidden');
      //s.filter('#'+d).find('.s').val('');
      s.filter('#'+d).find('.s').trigger('focusin');
    }
  });
  s.find('.s').on('focusin',function () {
    if ($(this).val()==sVal) {
      $(this).val('');
    }
  })
  s.find('.s').on('focusout',function () {
    var v=$(this).val();
    if (orz.isEmpty(v)) {
      v=sVal;
    }
    s.find('.s').val(v);
  })
})(jQuery);
/*首页动态大图搜索结束*/

```

**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\Render\Js\jitheme.jz.js**

```javascript
//iframe内部禁止方法
window.onload=function(){

  document.getElementById('iframe').contentDocument.onkeydown = function(ev){
	 
	//禁止保存ctrl+s
	if (ev && (ev.ctrlKey || ev.metaKey) && (ev.keyCode == 83)) {
	    Qmsg['success']('本站禁止了此功能，如需要技术支持请联系管理员', {
            html: true
        });
		return false;
	}
	//禁止F12等等~~
    if(ev && (ev.keyCode == 123 || ev.keyCode == 18 || ev.keyCode == 16) ) {
	    Qmsg['success']('本站禁止了此功能，如需要技术支持请联系管理员', {
            html: true
        });
	    return false;
    }	
  }
  //禁止右键
  document.getElementById('iframe').contentDocument.oncontextmenu = function(){ 
    	    Qmsg['success']('本站禁止了此功能，如需要技术支持请联系管理员', {             html: true         });
    return false;
  } 
  
}
//iframe外部禁止
document.onkeydown = function(){/*9:Tab键, 17：Control键, 18:Alt键, 123:F12键, 83:S键*/
	
    //禁止保存ctrl+s
	if (window.event && (window.event.ctrlKey || window.event.metaKey) && (window.event.keyCode == 83)) {
			    Qmsg['success']('本站禁止了此功能，如需要技术支持请联系管理员', {             html: true         });
		return false;
	}
	
	//禁止F12等等~~
    if(window.event && (window.event.keyCode == 123)) {
            	    Qmsg['success']('本站禁止了此功能，如需要技术支持请联系管理员', {             html: true         });
            window.event.returnValue=false;
        }
    }

//屏蔽右键
document.oncontextmenu = function (event){
    if(window.event){
    event = window.event;
    }
    try{
    var the = event.srcElement;
        if (!((the.tagName == "INPUT" && the.type.toLowerCase() == "text") || the.tagName == "TEXTAREA")){
        return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
    catch (e){
        return false;
    }
}

//屏蔽选中
document.onselectstart = function (event){
    if(window.event){
        event = window.event;
        }
    try{
        var the = event.srcElement;
        if (!((the.tagName == "INPUT" && the.type.toLowerCase() == "text") || the.tagName == "TEXTAREA")){
        return false;
        }
        return true;
        } 
    catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}
//屏蔽复制
document.oncopy = function (event){
    if(window.event){
    event = window.event;
    }
    try{
        var the = event.srcElement;
        if(!((the.tagName == "INPUT" && the.type.toLowerCase() == "text") || the.tagName == "TEXTAREA")){
        return false;
        }
        return true;
        }
    catch (e){
        return false;
    }
}

//屏蔽剪切
document.oncut = function (event){
    if(window.event){
    event = window.event;
    }
    try{
        var the = event.srcElement;
        if(!((the.tagName == "INPUT" && the.type.toLowerCase() == "text") || the.tagName == "TEXTAREA")){
        return false;
        }
        return true;
        }
    catch (e){
        return false;
    }
}

//屏蔽粘贴
document.onpaste = function (event){
    if(window.event){
        event = window.event;
        }
    try{
        var the = event.srcElement;
        if (!((the.tagName == "INPUT" && the.type.toLowerCase() == "text") || the.tagName == "TEXTAREA")){
        return false;
        }
        return true;
        }
    catch (e){
        return false;
    }
}

```

**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\Render\Js\script.js**

```javascript
$(function() {

    var browser = {
        versions: function() {
            var e = navigator.userAgent;
            navigator.appVersion;
            return {
                trident: e.indexOf("Trident") > -1,
                presto: e.indexOf("Presto") > -1,
                webKit: e.indexOf("AppleWebKit") > -1,
                gecko: e.indexOf("Gecko") > -1 && -1 == e.indexOf("KHTML"),
                mobile: !!e.match(/AppleWebKit.*Mobile.*/),
                ios: !!e.match(/\(i[^;]+;( U;)? CPU.+Mac OS X/),
                android: e.indexOf("Android") > -1 || e.indexOf("Linux") > -1,
                iPhone: e.indexOf("iPhone") > -1,
                iPad: e.indexOf("iPad") > -1,
                webApp: -1 == e.indexOf("Safari")
            }
        }(),
        language: (navigator.browserLanguage || navigator.language).toLowerCase()
    };

    function post_video() {
        if (browser.versions.mobile)
            return !1;
        $(document).on("mouseenter mouseleave", ".width-1-4", function(t) {
            var e = $(this).find(".show-image")
                , i = $(this).find("video");
            i.hide();
            if ("mouseenter" == t.type) {
                $(this).find(".play-icon").css('opacity', 0);
                if (i.trigger("pause"),
                i.length <= 0)
                    return;
                e.hide(),
                    i.show()
                var a = i.attr("data-src");
                i.attr("src", a)
            } else
                "mouseleave" == t.type && i.trigger("pause"),
                    i.hide(),
                    e.show(),
                    $(this).find(".play-icon").css('opacity', '1')
        })
    }
    function post_music() {
        if (browser.versions.mobile)
            return !1;
        var url1 = window.location.href;
        var url2 = document.domain;
        var xyt = window.location.protocol + '//';
        var url = xyt + url2;
        $(document).on("mouseenter mouseleave", ".post-audio", function(t) {
            var i = $(this).find("video");
            if ("mouseenter" == t.type) {
                var id = $(this).attr('.audio-play');
                var src = $(this).attr('video-data');
                $(this).find('.play-icon').attr('src', '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/pause.svg');
                $(this).find('.play-pan').css({
                    "-webkit-animation": "z 5s linear 0s infinite",
                    "-moz-animation": "z 5s linear 0s infinite",
                    "-ms-animation": "z 5s linear 0s infinite",
                    "animation": "z 5s linear 0s infinite",
                })
                $(this).find('.play-zhen').css({
                    "transform": "rotate(15deg)"
                })
                $(this).find('.audio-play').attr('src', src);

                if (i.trigger("pause"),
                i.length <= 0)
                    return;
                e.hide(),
                    i.show();
                var a = i.attr("data-src");
                i.attr("src", a)
            } else
                "mouseleave" == t.type && i.trigger("pause"),
                    i.hide();
            var id = $(this).attr('post-id');
            var src = $(this).attr('video-data');
            $(this).find('.play-icon').attr('src', '/wp-content/themes/b2Jitheme/Center/Assets/images/mp3/play.svg');
            $(this).find('.play-zhen').css({
                "transform": "rotate(-9deg)"
            })
            $(this).find('.play-pan').css({
                "animation": "none"
            })
            $(this).find('#player-' + id).attr('src', '');
        })
    }
    post_video()
    post_music()
    if (jQuery('.ckplayer-video').length) {
        jQuery('.ckplayer-video').each(function() {
            jQuery(this).height(jQuery(this).width() * 0.5678);
        });
    }
    if (jQuery(".ckplayer-video-real").length) {
        jQuery(".ckplayer-video-real").bind('contextmenu', function() {
            return false;
        });
        jQuery(".ckplayer-video-real").each(function() {
            var conv = jQuery(this).data("video")
            conn = jQuery(this).data("nonce");
            new ckplayer({
                container: "#ckplayer-video-" + conn,
                variable: "player",
                autoplay: false,
                video: conv
            });
        });
    }
    //dplayer
    if (jQuery(".dplayer-video-real").length) {
        jQuery(".dplayer-video-real").bind('contextmenu', function() {
            return false;
        });
        jQuery(".dplayer-video-real").each(function() {
            var conv = jQuery(this).data("video")
            conn = jQuery(this).data("nonce");
            if (jQuery(this).hasClass("video-blob")) {
                jQuery(".article-video").append("<div class='article-video-loading' style='z-index: 9;position: absolute;top: calc(50% - 12px);left: 0;right: 0;color: #fff;font-size: 16px;text-align: center;'>视频加载中...</div>");
                window.URL = window.URL || window.webkitURL;
                var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
                // xhr.open("GET", Base64.decode(conv), true);
                xhr.open("GET", conv, true);
                xhr.responseType = "blob";
                xhr.timeout = 1000 * 60 * 1;
                xhr.onload = function(e) {
                    if (this.status == 200) {
                        var blob = this.response;
                        jQuery(".article-video-loading").remove();
                        new DPlayer({
                            container: document.getElementById("dplayer-video-" + conn),
                            screenshot: true,
                            autoplay: false,
                            video: {
                                url: window.URL.createObjectURL(blob),
                                pic: '',
                                thumbnails: '',
                                type: 'auto'
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
                xhr.send();
            } else {
                new DPlayer({
                    container: document.getElementById("dplayer-video-" + conn),
                    screenshot: true,
                    autoplay: false,
                    video: {
                        url: conv,
                        pic: '',
                        thumbnails: '',
                        type: 'auto'
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    }
    //播放
    $("li a.video_link_play,.ceo-video-list-liebiao-s a").on("click", function(event) {
        // event.preventDefault()
        console.log($(this).attr("data-video_link"))
        var video_link = $(this).attr("data-video_link")
        if (video_link) {
            if ($(".single-video iframe").length) {
                $(".single-video iframe").attr('src', $(this).attr("data-video_link"))
                $(".ceo-video-list-liebiao-box li div").removeClass('ceo-video-list-liebiao-s')
                $(".ceo-video-list-liebiao-box li div a").removeClass('ceo-video-list-liebiao-d')
                $(this).prev().addClass('ceo-video-list-liebiao-d')
                $(this).addClass('ceo-video-list-liebiao-d')
                return false;
            }
            if ($(".single-video video").length) {
                if(typeof DPlayer != "undefined" && DPlayer){
                    // debugger
                    new DPlayer({
                        container: document.getElementById("dplayer-video-" + conn),
                        screenshot: true,
                        autoplay: false,
                        video: {
                            // url: conv,
                            url: video_link,
                            pic: '',
                            thumbnails: '',
                            type: 'auto'
                        }
                    });
                }else{
                    $(".single-video video").attr('src', $(this).attr("data-video_link"))
                }
                $(this).parent().parent().find('.ceo-shop5-liebiao-d').removeClass('ceo-shop5-liebiao-d')
                $(this).prev().addClass('ceo-shop5-liebiao-d');//标题文字
                $(this).addClass('ceo-shop5-liebiao-d');//播放
                return false;
            }

        }
    })
})
$(function(){
    //获取要定位元素距离浏览器顶部的距离
    if ($(".ask-cat-list").length) {
        var navH = $(".ask-cat-list").offset().top;
    }
    //
    // console.log(navH);
    //滚动条事件
    $(window).scroll(function(){
        //获取滚动条的滑动距离
        var toggle = document.querySelector('.ask-cat-list');
        var scroH = $(this).scrollTop();
        // console.log(scroH);
        //滚动条的滑动距离大于等于定位元素距离浏览器顶部的距离，就固定，反之就不固定
        if(scroH>=navH){
            toggle.classList.add("guding");
            toggle.classList.remove('talk-list-fixed');
        }else if(scroH<navH){
            toggle.classList.remove('guding');
            toggle.classList.add("talk-list-fixed");
        }
     })
});
$(function() {
/*消息列表-----start*/
 var swiper = new Swiper("#Jitheme_message", {
    direction: 'vertical',  // 垂直轮播
    loop : true,    //切换效果 循环
    slidesPerView: 5,
    spaceBetween: 20,
    autoplay: {
        delay: 1000,
        stopOnLastSlide: false,
        disableOnInteraction: true,
    },
    autoplayPauseOnMouseEnter: true,
    autoplayDisableOnInteraction: false,
  });
});
```

**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\Render\Js\swiper.min.js**

```javascript
/**
 * Swiper 5.4.5
 * Most modern mobile touch slider and framework with hardware accelerated transitions
 * http://swiperjs.com
 *
 * Copyright 2014-2020 Vladimir Kharlampidi
 *
 * Released under the MIT License
 *
 * Released on: June 16, 2020
 */
```

**.\GET-www.acgn.cn\wp-content\themes\b2Jitheme\child.js**

```javascript
//您自己的js代码写到下面
//评论栏快捷打卡/一言回复
//$(function(){$('.com-form-button-l').after('<p id="mrxu_daka" style="color:#65adff">#不想打字就点我#</p>');});$(function() {$("#mrxu_daka").click(function() { $.getJSON("https://api.uixsj.cn/hitokoto/get?type=hitokoto&code=json",function(xu){ $("#textarea").val(xu.content);});});});
//指定位置插入代码
//$(function(){$('.post-module-thumb').after('<div class="item item-author"><div class="item-bg"><i class="thumb thumb-c"></i></div></div>');});
//首页是否购买VIP判断开始
var qukuai = new Vue({
	el:'.sort-mine-wrap',
	data:{
	},
	computed:{
        userData(){
            return this.$store.state.userData;
        }
    }
})
//首页是否购买VIP判断结束
var ht = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
ht.style.filter = "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(grayscale=1)";
//问答小工具
var askWidget = new Vue({
    el:'.ji-widget-ask',
    data:{
        data:'',
        fliter:'last',
        paged:1,
        pages:0,
        count:0,
        cat:0,
        empty:false,
        locked:false,
        prev:true,
        next:false
    },
    mounted(){
        if(!this.$refs.askwidget) return
        this.count = this.$refs.askwidget.getAttribute('data-count')
        this.time = this.$refs.askwidget.getAttribute('data-time')
        const archive = document.querySelector('.ask-archive')
        if(archive){
            this.cat = archive.getAttribute('data-term')
        }

        const single = document.querySelector('.ask-single-top')

        if(single){
            this.cat = single.getAttribute('data-term')
        }

        this.getData()
    },
    watch:{
        fliter(val){
            this.prev = true
            this.next = false
            this.data = ''
            this.paged = 1
            this.empty = false
            this.$refs.askwidget.querySelector('.gujia').style.display = 'block'
            this.getData()
        }
    },
    methods:{
        nexAc(){
            if(this.paged >= this.data.pages) return
            if(this.locked) return
            this.next = true
            this.paged++
            this.getData()
        },
        prevAc(){
            if(this.paged < 1) return
            if(this.locked) return
            this.prev = true
            this.paged--
            this.getData()
        },
        getData(){
            if(this.locked) return
            this.locked = true
            this.$http.post(b2_rest_url+'getAskData','paged='+this.paged+'&type='+this.fliter+'&count='+this.count+'&cat='+this.cat).then(res=>{
                this.locked = false
                if(this.paged == 1){
                    if(res.data.data.length == 0){
                        this.empty = true
                        this.data.data = []
                    }else{
                        this.data = res.data
                    }
                }else{
                    this.data.data = res.data.data
                }
                if(this.data.pages > 1 && this.paged < this.data.pages){
                    this.next = false
                }
                if(this.paged > 1){
                    this.prev = false
                }
                this.$nextTick(()=>{
                    this.$refs.askwidget.querySelector('.gujia').style.display = 'none'
                })

                
            })
        }
    }
})
//作者信息
var postAuthor = new Vue({
    el:'.ji-widget-author',
    data:{
        following:false
    },
    methods:{
        followingAc(){
            
            if(!b2token){
                login.show = true
            }else{
                this.$http.post(b2_rest_url+'AuthorFollow','user_id='+b2_global.author_id).then(res=>{
                    this.following = !this.following
                }).catch(err=>{
                    Qmsg['warning'](err.response.data.message,{html:true});
                })
            }
        },
        dmsg(){
            
            if(!b2token){
                login.show = true
            }else{
                b2Dmsg.userid = b2_global.author_id
                b2Dmsg.show = true
            }
        },
    }
})
//用户面板
var B2UserWidget = new Vue({
    el:'.ji-widget-user',
    data:{
        show:false,
        b2token:false
    },
    mounted(){
        this.b2token = b2token
    },
    computed:{
        userData(){
            return this.$store.state.userData
        },
        oauth(){
            return this.$store.state.oauthLink
        },
        announcement(){
            return this.$store.state.announcement
        },
        openOauth(){
            return this.$store.state.openOauth
        }
    },
    watch:{
        announcement(val){
            if(val && !this.show){
                this.resize()
            }
        }
    },
    methods:{
        resize(){
            this.$nextTick(()=>{
                if(!this.$refs.userWidget) return
                if(this.$refs.gujia){
                    this.$refs.gujia.style.display = 'none'
                }
                setTimeout(() => {
                    b2tooltip('.user-w-tips')
                }, 300);

                this.show = true
            })
        },
        markHistory(type){
            if(this.oauth.weixin.mp && type === 'weixin'){
                mpCode.show = true
            }
            b2setCookie('b2_back_url',window.location.href)
        }
    }
})
//加载画廊开始-->
var swiper = new Swiper('.mySwiper2', {
    preloadImages:false,
    autoHeight: true,
    autoplay: {
    disableOnInteraction: false,
    pauseOnMouseEnter: true,
    },
    grabCursor : true,
	loop: true,
	spaceBetween:0,
	autoHeight: true,
	navigation: {
		nextEl: ".swiper-button-next",
		prevEl: ".swiper-button-prev",
	},
	thumbs: {
	   
	    grabCursor : true,
		swiper: {
			el: '.mySwiper', //注意此处的设置方式
			spaceBetween: 10,
			slidesPerView: 'auto',
			watchSlidesProgress: true,
		}
	}
});

```

```html
        <script>
            function b2loadScript(url, id,callback){
                var script = document.createElement ("script");
                script.type = "text/javascript";
                script.id = id;
                if (script.readyState){
                    script.onreadystatechange = function(){
                        if (script.readyState == "loaded" || script.readyState == "complete"){
                            script.onreadystatechange = null;
                            callback();
                        }
                    };
                } else {
                    script.onload = function(){
                        callback();
                    }
                }
                script.src = url;
                document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(script);
            }
            function b2loadStyle(url, id,callback){
                var script = document.createElement ("link");
                script.type = "text/css";
                script.rel = "stylesheet";
                script.id = id;
                if (script.readyState){
                    script.onreadystatechange = function(){
                        if (script.readyState == "loaded" || script.readyState == "complete"){
                            script.onreadystatechange = null;
                            callback();
                        }
                    };
                } else {
                    script.onload = function(){
                        callback();
                    }
                }
                script.href = url;
                document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(script);
            }
            function b2getCookie(name){
                var nameEQ = name + "=";
                var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
                for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
                    var c = ca[i];
                    while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
                    if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
                }
                return null;
            }

            function b2setCookie(name,value,days){
                days = days ? days : 100;
                var expires = "";
                if (days) {
                    var date = new Date();
                    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days*24*60*60*1000));
                    expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
                }
                document.cookie = name + "=" + (value || "")  + expires + "; path=/";
            }

            function b2delCookie(name){
                document.cookie = name +'=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';
            }
        </script>

		        <script type="text/javascript">
            if(window.localStorage){
                /* 暗黑判断 */
                var dark = localStorage.getItem('darkStyle');
                var toggle = document.querySelector('.dark-style-toggle');
                if(dark == 1 && !toggle.classList.contains('active')){
                    document.body.classList.add("style-for-dark");
                    toggle.classList.add('active')
                }else if(dark == 0 && toggle.classList.contains('active')){
                    document.body.classList.remove('style-for-dark');
                    toggle.classList.remove('active');
                }
            }
        </script><div class="b2-content">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1514.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>新番《ARTE》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            新视觉绘中描绘了主人公阿尔蒂、威尼斯的名门贵族法利耶尔家的尤利和阿尔蒂担任家庭教师的卡塔丽娜在不停摇晃的凤尾船上的画面。而且新PV中可以听到安野希世乃演唱的ED《晴れ模様》。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>26</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1512">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1512.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010190082.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010190082.jpg"   alt="TV动画《非枪人生》第二季" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1512.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>TV动画《非枪人生》第二季</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《非枪人生》以用机械改造身体已经成为很常见的事情的世界为舞台，讲述了以头部为枪的男主角乾十三为中心的科幻动作故事。在这次的第二季中，泽野弘之的SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]、Jean-Ken Johnny将负责演唱OP主题曲《Chaos Drifters》。ED主题曲为THIS IS JAPAN演唱的《new world》。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>17</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1510.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《LoveLive》新作动画宣传图</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《LoveLive！》新系列企划公开了一张宣传图，从这张图上可以看到众多角色过马路的样子，不少网友猜测中间的妹子是本次新作的主角。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1508.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010173110.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010173110.jpg"   alt="《黄金神威》支遁动物记篇OVA化" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1508.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《黄金神威》支遁动物记篇OVA化</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            这次的OVA是继15卷、17卷、19卷之后的第四弹作品。在本作中将讲述主人公杉元等人，为了救助因虐杀动物而被抓的谷垣，而去追查真正的犯人的故事。在这段故事中登场的角色姉畑，将由堀秀行配音。 《黄金神威》讲述了被誉为&ldquo;不死的杉元&rdquo;的主人公，在北海道的土地上，展开一场围绕着&ldquo;黄金&rdquo;的生存竞争的故事。原作漫画由野田サトル创作，目前正在《周刊YOUNG JU&hellip;
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>4</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1506.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>动画《攻壳机动队 SAC_2045》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            本作是《攻壳机动队》系列第一部全3DCG的动画作品，由Production I.G和SOLA DIGITAL ARTS合作制作，神山健治和荒牧伸志担任导演。作品预计将于2020年4月在Netflix上独家播出。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1504.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>TRIGGER新作《BNA》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            本作是由吉成曜担任导演，中岛一树担任编剧，TRIGGER负责制作的原创动画。讲述了在一天突然变成了兽人的女高中生影森满，逃往兽人特区后发生的事情。在这次公开的第三弹宣传图中，可以看到包括主人公在内的主要角色的样子。诸星堇、细谷佳正等人将为本作配音
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>6</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1502">

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1502.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010133343.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010133343.jpg"   alt="漫画《贤惠幼妻仙狐小姐》" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1502.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>漫画《贤惠幼妻仙狐小姐》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            漫画《贤惠幼妻仙狐小姐》在本日（10日）发售了单行本第六卷。一段由新角色福田（花泽香菜配音）担任旁白的PV也一并公开。这次的新角色福田是喜欢主人公中野的公司的后辈，在PV中可以看到福田和由福岛润配音的中野一起对第六卷进行的介绍。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1500.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010111617.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010111617.jpg"   alt="动画电影《想要哭的我戴上了猫面具》" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">

                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1500.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>动画电影《想要哭的我戴上了猫面具》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            由动画工作室colorido制作新作动画电影《想要哭的我戴上了猫面具》公开了正式宣传图、预告片、主题歌等消息。在预告片中，可以听到本作的主题曲《花之亡灵》，看到变成叫&ldquo;太郎&rdquo;的猫的女主，以及放弃了当人的猫们的神秘世界等片段。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>8</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1498">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1498.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010093333.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010093333.jpg"   alt="动画《Re：从零开始的异世界生活》第二季" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1498.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>动画《Re：从零开始的异世界生活》第二季</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《Re：从零开始的异世界生活》根据长月达平创作的同名轻小说改编，讲述了来到了异世界的有着死亡回归能力的主人公菜月昴的冒险故事。TV动画第一部曾于2016年播出，另外还有OVA等作品。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>28</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1496">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1496.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010064577.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010064577.jpg"   alt="TV动画《放学后海堤日记》第二弹" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1496.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>TV动画《放学后海堤日记》第二弹</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《放学后海堤日记》的原作是一部以主人公阳渚等4名女高中生为中心的钓鱼主题漫画。以升学到高中为契机搬到了临海街道的主人公阳渚，在散步时偶然与黑岩学姐相遇并加入海堤部。在这个迷之海堤部中，她与伙伴们开始了钓鱼、吃鱼、享受海之魅力的日常生活。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>5</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1494">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1494.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010052232.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010052232.jpg"   alt="TV动画《租借女友》" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1494.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>TV动画《租借女友》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《租借女友》是以20岁的不起眼的大学生木之下和也为主人公的恋爱喜剧。讲述了他在与第一个女友交往一个月被甩，申请了&ldquo;租借女友&rdquo;的服务后所发生的故事。本作动画将由TMS Entertainment负责制作，古贺一臣担任导演，广田光毅编剧，雨宫天、悠木碧、东山奈央、高桥李依、堀江瞬参与配音。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>12</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1492">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1492.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010041728.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w518_h260_g0_mark_2024101010041728.jpg"   alt="《偶像活动 on Parade!》出网络动画" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1492.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《偶像活动 on Parade!》出网络动画</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            网络动画《偶像活动 on Parade!》宣布了将于3月28日开始在YouTube上播出。本作将以新人偶像音城诺艾尔和姫石来希为中心展开，其中音城诺艾尔将由加隈亚衣配音，姫石来希则与TV版相同由逢来凛配音。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>4</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/animation">动漫</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li></ul>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1476.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>来面试的人正是人事部长最喜欢的VTuber</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            经常公开插图和漫画的推特网友apricot0，在推特上公开的一段有关扮演美少女VTuber的人，来到一家人事部长是这名VTuber的忠实粉丝的公司面试的事故。在这个故事中，一名青年男性正在接受公司的面试。由于表现良好，看上去十分严厉的人事部长也在心中认为他很合格。不过就在问&ldquo;你目前最努力的事情是什么&rdquo;的时候，青年回答的&ldquo;我目前正在为作为VTuber萌月姬的活动而&hellip;
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>7</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/comic">漫画</a></div></div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1474.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>曾被动画化的漫画《魔法少女网站》即将完结</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            根据漫画《魔法少女网站》的作者佐藤健太郎的推特消息，漫画《魔法少女网站》即将完结。算上在周四（18日）发售的《周刊少年Champion》上的内容，作品还有3话。另外《魔法少女网站》单行本的最新15卷，将于8月8日发售。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1472.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>让我们做什么都可以！慎本真新连载《丑闻偶像》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            近期在白泉社的APP上开始连载。首先我解释一下，标题不是你们想的那个样子！封面图也不是你们想的那个样子！！这是一部描述因各种丑闻一度退出演艺界的4个过气爱豆，重新组成了一个偶像团体再次出道的搞笑漫画
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1470.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《理科生坠入情网故尝试证明》第6卷发售！声优配音CM公开</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            配合这次发售，COMICMeteor公开了前几天刚刚发表的动画版声优出演的CM。在这次公开的CM中，可以听到内田雄马配音的雪村心夜和雨宫天配音的冰室菖蒲的声音。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1468.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009120748.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009120748.jpg"   alt="漫画《DEATH NOTE》时隔11年将发表新短篇！" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1468.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>漫画《DEATH NOTE》时隔11年将发表新短篇！</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            由大场鸫原作、小畑健作画的漫画《DEATH NOTE》，宣布了将要推出新短篇的消息。这次的新作也是自2008年以来，时隔11年的作品。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>3</span></li></ul>

                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1466">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1466.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009112993.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009112993.jpg"   alt="漫画《绝顶》：独秃秃，不如众秃秃" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1466.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>漫画《绝顶》：独秃秃，不如众秃秃</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            江湖中人最怕什么？ 武功差劲？伤病缠身？相貌平平？穷困潦倒？ 都不是。武侠小说里，主人公可以不高不帅不强不富，甚至不那么正义凛然也无所谓，但他决不能秃，即便是像虚竹少年那样出身少林，最后也多半也会还俗长出头发&hellip;&hellip;而真真正正的「秃驴」，是很难坐上主角宝座的。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>2</span></li></ul>

            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1464">

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1464.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009104259.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009104259.jpg"   alt="秋叶原店公开2019年上半年本子漫画年间销量排行" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1464.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>秋叶原店公开2019年上半年本子漫画年间销量排行</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            秋叶原店A从2008年起，每年会公开上半年和全年两个销量榜单。目前虎穴秋叶原店A公开了2019年上半年成年漫画的销量排行榜。这次的榜单统计的是2019年1月1日至6月30日间，对应的漫画的销量情况。其中，爱上陆创作的第二部单行本《被欺负》排名第一。本作讲述了男主角通过催眠对欺负自己的三名女生展开复仇的故事，作品曾被轻小说化出版。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>17</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/comic">漫画</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1462">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1462.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009072463.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101009072463.jpg"   alt="织田信长转生成人体模型！今条真理之新连载" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1462.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>织田信长转生成人体模型！今条真理之新连载</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            今条真理之的新连载《织田信长转生成人体模型的故事》目前已经开始连载。在本作中，织田信长对在极乐净土的生活已经感到厌烦。在佛祖的介绍下，织田信长得知了与抽卡手游中的抽卡相似的转生系统。消费功德点数就可以进行抽卡，当抽到星5的SSR卡时，就能转生成人类，开始新的人生。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>2</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/comic">漫画</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1460.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>漫画家槙阳子引退！漫画《闪闪发光的狮子男孩》完结</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            漫画家槙阳子创作的漫画《闪闪发光的狮子男孩》在本日（3日）发售的《RIBON 8月号》（集英社）上迎来了最终话。槙阳子也通过Instagram宣布正式引退。槙阳子表示：我槙阳子将这次的连载作为最后的作品，就此从漫画业界引退。非常感谢长久以来一直支持着我的广大读者们。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/comic">漫画</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1458.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>傲娇少女的日常4格！漫画《坦率不起来的爱染同学》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            由千氏夜创作的新连载《坦率不起来的爱染同学》，于2日开始在星海社的4格漫画配信账号&ldquo;推4&rdquo;上公开了。在本作中，讲述了虽然喜欢同班同学后藤，但却由于害羞总是说出一些不好听的话，之后又感到后悔的傲娇女主角爱染，与误以为被爱染讨厌的后藤之间的恋爱喜剧。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1445.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《自走棋》手游内测体验：游戏节奏是一大难题</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            万众瞩目的《自走棋》手游终于开启内测，与玩家们正式见面了。本人有幸在预约时拿到了内测激活码，在这里就让我来带领大家体会一下首款&ldquo;自走棋&rdquo;手游的内外品质如何。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>5</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/game">游戏</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1443">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1443.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008335569.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008335569.jpg"   alt="东方Project第17弹游戏《东方鬼形兽》预计夏季完成" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1443.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>东方Project第17弹游戏《东方鬼形兽》预计夏季完成</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            根据博客&ldquo;博丽幻想书谱&rdquo;消息，东方Project系列的第17弹游戏《东方鬼形兽 〜 Wily Beast and Weakest Creature.》预计将于今夏完成。如果不出意外，在5月5日举办的令和首届例大祭上将推出体验版。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>7</span></li></ul>

                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1441">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1441.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008331492.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008331492.jpg"   alt="吉崎观音担任主要画师！KADOKAWA宣布推出新作手游" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1441.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>吉崎观音担任主要画师！KADOKAWA宣布推出新作手游</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            KADOKAWA宣布将于2019年夏推出一部全新的手游企划《シャチバト！》（暂定）。本作将由吉崎观音（兽娘动物园）担任主要画师，五十岚雄策（乃木坂春香的秘密）担任主要剧本，山本雅博（魔界战记）担任游戏导演，冈本吉起担任执行制作人。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>2</span></li></ul>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1439.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>索尼公开PS5最新消息！不仅是升级更是一次革命</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            具体来说，PS5将会采用AMD的新型CPU&ldquo;Zen 2&rdquo;和Radeon的GPU&ldquo;Navi&rdquo;。支持8K画面，对应预测3D画面中光线的复杂交互作用的光线追踪，可以达到好莱坞电影的视觉效果。声音方面也将有飞跃式的提升，增加游戏的临场感。存储设备将从过去的HDD变为特制的SSD，提高游戏的读写速度。另外在PS5上，将带有与PS4和PSVR的互换性。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>5</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/game">游戏</a></div></div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1437.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>人气游戏《八方旅人》6月8日登陆Steam平台！</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            由Square Enix、Acquire、FarEast Amusement Research共同制作的人气游戏《八方旅人（歧路旅人）》宣布了将于6月8日登陆Steam平台的消息。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1435.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>魔女之泉1重制版：猎巫时代里魔女的魔幻人生</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            魔女之泉1重制版&ldquo;疾风魔女&rdquo;是由韩国&ldquo;kiwiwalks&rdquo;出品，以童话故事为背景的RPG类手游，该游戏共设置了9个结局，多张CG插画。因此，许多追求完美的玩家会通过多刷而获得全插画，体验不同的结局。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1433.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>EA发布游戏《星球大战》新作预告片</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            主人公卡尔&middot;凯斯提斯&mdash;66号令大清洗之后绝地武士团的幸存者之一&mdash;现在则是个逃亡中的绝地学徒。玩家扮演最后的绝地武士卡尔&middot;凯斯，被迫踏上了逃亡的道路，途中他必须隐姓埋名，不能相信任何人，在帝国发现你重建绝地组织的意图之前，赶紧完成训练。
                        </p>
                        </div>
```
