```html
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1431.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>尼泊尔宣布禁止游戏《绝地求生》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            MPCD的Dhiraj Pratap Singh在得到当地地方法院的认可后，向电信管理局下达了停止对本作游戏进行服务的通知。不过电信管理局的副局长Sandip Adhikari在接受路透社的采访时表示，这次是由于青少年有对本作上瘾的情况而禁止的，目前还没有因此而引发的案件。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>5</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/game">游戏</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1429">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1429.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008083461.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008083461.jpg"   alt="游戏《致全体人类》宣布延期发售" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1429.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>游戏《致全体人类》宣布延期发售</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《致全体人类》是以荒废了的秋叶原为舞台，讲述五名妹子在这里所展开的日常生活。妹子们将通过对街道进行探索，发现在废墟中的各种道具，并利用它们生火，捕捉野生动物等。进行耕种的话，还可以培育出各种蔬菜。如果在生活上遇到了困难，也可以在同人商店中寻求帮助。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>3</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/game">游戏</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1427">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1427.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008071448.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101008071448.jpg"   alt="在下《刀使巫女 隐世之乱》 请诸位赐教" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1427.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>在下《刀使巫女 隐世之乱》 请诸位赐教</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《刀使巫女&nbsp;隐世之乱》是根据原版动画改编的一款正版日漫授权学园风RPG手游,由新锐手游发行商闪电互娱发行，游戏正式开启首次技术测试。在正式上线之前，我们想为大家带来一款真正的好玩的优质游戏，所以，我们在今天开展为期一周的不限量试玩活动~！以得到玩家的真实意见与反馈，提升游戏质量。游戏的未来，玩家说了算！
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>3</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/game">游戏</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li></ul>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1409.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>游戏《天穗之咲稻姬》推出官方后传小说</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《天穗之咲稻姬》是将和支配岛屿的鬼战斗的爽快动作战斗和模拟种大米的要素相结合的角色扮演类。这次的《天穗之咲稻姬 心环种稻日志》将以游戏中的主人公咲稻姬的好友心环姬为主角，讲述游戏本篇之后，心环姬也来找咲稻姬一起种田的故事。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>8</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/novel">轻小说</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1407.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>和遥树奈计划VTuber轻小说作家出道</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            和遥树奈计划所属的VTuber电波酱，宣布了轻小说作家出道的消息。出道作《Goodbye现实世界 从黑客开始的异世界改变》即将发售。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1405.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>轻小说《剃须。然后捡到女高中生。》完结第5卷</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《剃须。然后捡到女高中生。》第5卷内容简介：吉田和沙优一起回到北海道的老家。但是，等待着打开门的沙优的却是母亲的一巴掌。与母亲，还有面对自己的沙优，吉田守护着她的决心是&hellip;&hellip;。既不是恋人也不是家人的两个人的故事，正式完结！
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1403.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>新作短篇小说《新·欢迎加入NHK！》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《新&middot;欢迎加入NHK！》将于5月16日东京文学即卖会上以刊物形式发售，新作短篇小说由《欢迎加入NHK！》原作者泷本龙彦执笔，讲述佐藤与小岬的后续故事。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1401.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007353746.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007353746.jpg"   alt="麻枝准首部小说《狩猫族族长》" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">

                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1401.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>麻枝准首部小说《狩猫族族长》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            由Key社的麻枝准创作的首部文艺小说，宣布了将于5月17日由讲谈社刊行的消息。在这次的小说中，将讲述一位被猫嫌弃，想要自杀的天才作曲家，和一无所有的大学生之间的，即使心意无法相通也能依然温暖的故事。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1399.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007345417.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007345417.jpg"   alt="角川“轻小说EXPO2020”人气投票结果公布" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1399.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>角川“轻小说EXPO2020”人气投票结果公布</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            那么就让我们一起来看看最终结果吧： 最强的主人公部门： 一位：《刀剑神域》 二位：《魔法科高校的劣等生》 三位：《里亚德录大地》 四位：《秀逗魔导士》 五位：《绯弹的亚里亚》
                        </p>
                        </div>

            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1397">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1397.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>斋藤千和等声优朗读人气小说《物语系列》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            人气小说《物语系列》的有声读物在Amazon的Audible上上线了。一卷约8小时时长，参与了动画配音的神谷浩史和斋藤千和等声优，负责对小说的各卷进行朗读。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1395.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《文豪野犬》解说当成《洛神赋》原文引用</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            近日，kadokawa公开了即将于2月27日发售的《文豪野犬Storm Bringer》的试读内容。不过，有读者在试读的第9页中，发现了一处引用错误的情况。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1393.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>网文无双！秋叶原人气书店公开1月轻小说销量榜</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            东京秋叶原的人气书店书泉Book Tower公开了1月轻小说销量榜。从这次的销量榜上看，前十名的作品都是&ldquo;成为小说家吧&rdquo;上的网文书籍化的作品，直接出版的商业作品表现欠佳。排名第一的，是《魔法科高校的劣等生》系列的新作《新&middot;魔法科高校的劣等生 天鹅座的少女们》。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/novel">轻小说</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1391.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>橘公司×Tsunako！《约会大作战》作者组合出新作</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            创作过《约会大作战》的橘公司和Tsunako，宣布了将要推出新作的消息。在这次的新作中，依然将由橘公司原作，Tsunako负责绘制插图。根据橘公司透露，如果一切顺利的话，这次的新作将于春季发售。不过有关作品的名称和内容，还将于日后公开。
                        </p>
                        </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1387.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>萤火虫创意设计大赛来袭！</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            在你心目中，虫娘是什么样子的呢？ 之前虫娘举办的「虫娘成长日记」活动中 有超级多优秀作品入围 看得虫娘都眼花缭乱，挑不过来了！
                        </p>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1385.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>COMICUPth29mini·广州</a></h2>

                            CP29mini在广州琶洲会展馆开展，全国各地的小伙伴在严格的疫情管控制度下井然有序参加本次漫展，下面就让我们来看看这次摄影师给我们拍下的现场照片吧！

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1383.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007160482.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007160482.jpg"   alt="Kizuna AI活动停止前最后一场演唱会" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1383.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>Kizuna AI活动停止前最后一场演唱会</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            主办方Kizuna AI株式会社在筹备时向全世界的虚拟主播发出出席邀约，收到了超过6000人的报名，最终出席演唱会的虚拟嘉宾多达1820人。除了虚拟嘉宾，此次演唱会还邀请了日本著名艺人和五位著名DJ前来助阵。两小时内演唱了Kizuna AI活动以来发布的十余首单曲，包括代表作《AIAIAI》、《hello,morning》、《future base》，和《never stop my beat》、《&hellip;
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1381.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>艾妮动漫游戏展xK的游戏嘉年华</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            突破！次元壁岌岌可危！ 一张邀请函将剧本与动漫的结合 一连串的谜题背后深埋的秘密到底是什么？ 几张夹在剧本中肖像碎片， 拼出那张未完成的肖像画， 又将揭示怎样的秘闻？ 跟随神秘邀请函，2万平超大实景， 探秘搜证解开，奇妙旅程即将启航
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>4</span></li></ul>

                    </div>
                
                    </div>

            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1379">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1379.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007122349.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007122349.jpg"   alt="《美少女战士》30周年企划启动！展开多方面联动" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1379.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>《美少女战士》30周年企划启动！展开多方面联动</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            《美少女战士》是在《好朋友》1992年2月号（讲谈社）至1997年3月号上连载的作品。在这迎来连载开始30周年之际，官方还将举办大型展会。在展会上将展示漫画、动画、音乐、周边等各种资料。有关展会的详细情况，还将于日后公开。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>2</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/manzhan">漫展</a></div></div>
                    </div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li><li class="post-list-item item-" id="item-1377">
                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1377.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007095189.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024101007095189.jpg"   alt="次元连结 守护新年 西铁城x鬼灭之刃联名腕表爆燃上市" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>
                        </div>
                    
                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月10日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1377.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>次元连结 守护新年 西铁城x鬼灭之刃联名腕表爆燃上市</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            二次元的世界永远都不只是少年的挚爱，更是许多成年人内心深处珍藏的纯真与赤诚。近年大热的日本动画《鬼灭之刃》便是这样一部触动无数人灵魂的超人气之作，这部诠释了人性、梦想、勇气与爱的动画作品在全球范围都引发了强烈共鸣。岁末年初之际，同样心怀梦想与激情的腕表品牌西铁城与《鬼灭之刃》首次携手，重磅推出五款角色联名限量款腕表，共同带来破次元的新年守护大礼。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>3</span></li></ul>

                    </div>

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1375.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>ufotableCafe成都店正式营业，首期主题《鬼灭之刃》</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            成都新增一网红打卡地啦！近日，ufotableCafe中国官方微博正式官宣，ufotableCafe成都店已于11月27日正式营业。ufotableCafe是日本知名动画制作公司ufotable（飞碟社）旗下的动漫主题餐饮品牌，围绕ufotable制作的动画作品打造主题门店，提供定制化美食，独家周边，特色活动等。店铺在四川省成都市锦江区宏济新路142号。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1373.html"><i class="ico icon-talk-hot-1"></i>日本画师荻pote举办插画展“荻pote展览会 OGIPOTEN”</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            插画展&ldquo;荻pote展览会 OGIPOTEN&rdquo;目前正在虎穴秋叶原店A举办。在这次的展会上，展出了作者年内发表的作品集《可爱之处》中收录的多张作品的复制插图，另外还有周边商品销售区等区域。下面是日本网站秋叶原博客拍摄的现场照片，本展会将开至10月31日。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">

                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1216.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024100304314933.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024100304314933.jpg"   alt="第三届古北水镇红叶祭正式开幕" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月3日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1216.html">第三届古北水镇红叶祭正式开幕</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>
                            为期3天的古北水镇红叶祭，今日正式开幕！作为以国风文化为亮点的青年文化节，本届红叶祭以&ldquo;如焰&rdquo;为主题，热烈而非喧闹，多彩而又多元。在红叶祭期间，国风妆造模特大赛、宅舞大赛、电竞电玩大赛、国风市集、花船巡游等多重青年文化活动将齐聚司马台长城脚下，用一场如焰的狂欢点燃今秋。
                        </p>
                        </div>
                        
                    <div class="post-list-meta-box">
                        <ul class="post-list-meta"><li class="post-list-meta-like"><span><i class="b2font b2-heart-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-comment"><span><i class="b2font b2-chat-2-fill "></i>0</span></li><li class="post-list-meta-views"><span><i class="b2font b2-eye-fill "></i>7</span></li></ul>
                        <div class="jitheme_cat"><div class="post-list-cat"><a  target="_blank" class="post-list-cat-item" href="https://www.acgn.cn/manzhan">漫展</a></div></div>

                <div class="item-in box b2-radius">
                    <div class="post-module-thumb jitheme-radius" style="padding-top:50%">
                        <a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1214.html" rel="nofollow" class="thumb-link"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024100304303412.webp" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="post-thumb lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/uploads/thumb/2024/09/fill_w535_h268_g0_mark_2024100304303412.jpg"   alt="《美妙系列》十周年！日本新潟县举办10周年企划展" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture></a>
                        
                        
                        <div class="jitheme_cat_jb"></div>

                    <div class="post-info jitheme-post-info">
                         <div class="list-footera">
                    <a class="post-list-meta-avatar" href="https://www.acgn.cn/users/1"><picture class="picture" ><source type="image/webp" data-srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg" srcset="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg" /><img  class="avatar b2-radius lazy" data-src="https://www.acgn.cn/images/astyle/avatar.jpg"   alt="ACGN.cn" src="https://www.acgn.cn/wp-content/themes/b2/Assets/fontend/images/default-img.jpg"/></picture><div class="jitheme_avatar_data"><span class="jitheme_avatar">ACGN.cn</span><span class="jitheme_data" ><span><span class="jitheme_data_d">·</span>10月3日</span></span></div></a>
                    
                </div>
                        <h2><a  target="_blank" href="https://www.acgn.cn/1214.html">《美妙系列》十周年！日本新潟县举办10周年企划展</a></h2>
                        <div class="post-excerpt">
                        <p>

  var closeButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('close');

  for (var i = 0; i < closeButtons.length; i++) {
    closeButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function() {
      this.parentNode.style.display = 'none';
    });
  }
</script>

<!--头部搜索-->
<script type="text/javascript">
        var onecad_search = document.getElementById("onecad_search");
        var onecad_btna = document.getElementById("onecad_btna");
        var btnb = document.getElementById("onecad_btnb");
        var mobile_menu  = document.getElementById("mobile-menu");
    function testDisplay()
    {
    
        if(onecad_search.style.top="-70px")
        {
            onecad_search.style.display = "block";
            onecad_search.style.top = "0px";
            onecad_search.style.transition = "all 0.3s ease-in-out 0s";
            onecad_btnb.style.display = "block";
            onecad_btna.style.display = "none";
            mobile_menu.style.display = "none";
        }
    }
    function testnone()
    {
        if(onecad_search.style.display=="block")
        {
            onecad_btna.style.display = "block";
            onecad_search.style.transition = "all 0.3s ease-in-out 0s";
            onecad_search.style.top = "-70px";
            onecad_btnb.style.display = "none";
            mobile_menu.style.display = "block";
            
        }
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">	
        //设置定时器容器
        var countDownTimer = null ;
        //获取元素
        var day =  document.getElementById("_d");
        var hour = document.getElementById("_h");
        var minute = document.getElementById("_m");
        var second = document.getElementById("_s");
	    //获取截止时间的时间戳（单位毫秒）
	    var str = "2022/10/10 00:00:00"
        var inputTime = +new Date(str);
        //我们先调用countDown函数，可以避免在打开界面后停一秒后才开始倒计时
        if(day && hour && minute && second) {
            countDown();
        }
        //定时器 每隔一秒变化一次
        countDownTimer =  setInterval(countDown, 1000);
        function countDown() {
            //获取当前时间的时间戳（单位毫秒）
            var nowTime = +new Date();
            //把剩余时间毫秒数转化为秒
            var times = (inputTime - nowTime) / 1000;
            if(times > 0){
                 //计算天数
                var d = Math.floor(times/60/60/24)
                if(day){
                    day.innerHTML = d
                    //如果小时数小于 10，要变成 0 + 数字的形式 赋值给盒子
                    day.innerHTML = d < 10 ? "0" + d : d;
                }
                //计算小时数 转化为整数
                var h = parseInt(times / 60 / 60 % 24);
                //如果小时数小于 10，要变成 0 + 数字的形式 赋值给盒子
                if(hour){
                    hour.innerHTML = h < 10 ? "0" + h : h;
                }
                //计算分钟数 转化为整数
                var m = parseInt(times / 60 % 60);
                //如果分钟数小于 10，要变成 0 + 数字的形式 赋值给盒子
                if(minute){
                    minute.innerHTML = m < 10 ? "0" + m : m;
                }
                //计算描述 转化为整数
                var s = parseInt(times % 60);
                //如果秒钟数小于 10，要变成 0 + 数字的形式 赋值给盒子
                if(second){
                    second.innerHTML = s < 10 ? "0" + s : s;
                }
            }else{
                // 停止定时器，清空定时器
                clearInterval(countDownTimer)
            }
        }
</script>

</body>
</html>
```
